column2: text
Clear Ruins||You will be presented with a puzzle to solve; you will be rewarded if you successfully decipher it. Though your quest for such trinkets will bring the annoyance of the Dark Gods.
Root Corruption||Take this land in the name of the Dark Gods!
Do Nothing||Leave the settlement as it stands, as any craven fool would!

Subjugate & Enslave||You gain wealth from looting, but buildings in the settlement are damaged. All captives are enslaved, [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} is greatly reduced, and your diplomatic relations with the previous owner also suffer greatly.
Obliterate||All buildings are destroyed and the settlement is torched. A Chaos alter is risen in it’s place, spewing corruption upon the land - much to our dark lords delight.
Root Corruption||With no regions under your control, you have the option to settle your army here.

Pillage & Enslave||You do not capture the settlement but instead steal wealth and damage buildings. All captives are enslaved, [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} is reduced, and the previous owners will like you a lot less.
Scavenge Ruins||You will be presented with a puzzle to solve; though I doubt a dim-witted troll like yourself can decipher it and reap the reward.
Make Sty||These ruins will make a good place to dump in.
Do Nothing||Leave the settlement as it stands.

Devour & Make Sty||You eat the locals and gain wealth from looting, but buildings in the settlement are damaged. All captives are eaten, [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} is greatly reduced, and your diplomatic relations with the previous owner also suffer greatly.
Ground to Dust||All buildings are smashed and the occupants massacred and eaten.
Make Sty||With no dumpings grounds, you have the option to dump here.

Pillage & Devour||You do not capture the settlement but instead steal wealth, eat the locals and damage buildings. All captives are eaten, [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} is reduced, and the previous owners will like you a lot less.
Scavenge Ruins||You will be presented with a puzzle to solve; with Fimúl's Eye we will reap its rewards.
Nest||Settle here and though it is a little bright and dry this is something we will soon remedy.
Do Nothing||Leave the settlement as it stands, as any craven cyclops would!

Enshroud||You gain wealth from looting, but buildings in the settlement are damaged. All captives are enslaved, [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} is greatly reduced, and your diplomatic relations with the previous owner also suffer greatly.
Obliterate||All buildings are destroyed and the settlement is torched. A Chaos alter is risen in it’s place, spewing corruption upon the land, all in Fimúlneid’s name!
Resettle||With no regions we must settle, Fimúlneid commands it.

Pillage & Enslave||You do not capture the settlement but instead steal wealth and damage buildings. All captives are enslaved, [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} is reduced, and the previous owners will like you a lot less.
Study Ruins||You will be presented with a puzzle to solve; you will be rewarded if you successfully decipher it.
Settle||Your people have a new home.
Do Nothing||Leave the settlement as it stands.

Collect Tithe & Occupy||You gain wealth from the tithe, but buildings in the settlement are damaged. All captives are converted, [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} is greatly reduced, and your diplomatic relations with the previous owner also suffer greatly.
Cleanse with Fire||All buildings are destroyed and the settlement is torched.
Resettle||With no regions currently under your control, you have the option to settle your people here.

Demand Offerings||You do not capture the settlement but instead take offerings in the form of gold and damage buildings. All captives are converted, [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} is reduced, and the previous owners will like you a lot less.
Purify & Settle||{{tr:occupation_decision_occupy}}
Salvage Old-Ones Gifts||You will be presented with a puzzle to solve; you will be rewarded if you successfully decipher it.
Settle||Your people have a new home.
Do Nothing||Leave the settlement as it stands.

Cleanse||You gain wealth from the cleanse, but buildings in the settlement are damaged. All captives are sacrificed, [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} is greatly reduced, and your diplomatic relations with the previous owner also suffer greatly.
Return to Gaia||All buildings are destroyed and the settlement is torched.
Resettle||With no regions currently under your control, you have the option to settle your people here.

Demand Offerings||You do not capture the settlement but instead take offerings in the form of gold and damage buildings. All captives are converted, [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} is reduced, and the previous owners will like you a lot less.
Guardianship||{{tr:occupation_decision_occupy}}
Study Ruins||You will be presented with a puzzle to solve; you will be rewarded if you successfully decipher it.
Settle||Your people have a new home.
Do Nothing||Leave the settlement as it stands.

Loot & Occupy||You gain wealth from looting, but buildings in the settlement are damaged. All captives are converted, [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} is greatly reduced, and your diplomatic relations with the previous owner also suffer greatly.
Raze||All buildings are destroyed and the settlement is torched.
Resettle||With no regions currently under your control, you have the option to settle your people here.

Demand Offerings||You do not capture the settlement but instead take offerings in the form of gold and damage buildings. All captives are converted, [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} is reduced, and the previous owners will like you a lot less.
Occupy||{{tr:occupation_decision_occupy}}
Jehad||This land once belonged to our people, we reclaim it in the name of Araby, in the name of our gods!
Endow To Numas||Place the settlement under the control of our gracious masters.
